root.name: Off-Road Drive
root.description: OverviewOff-Road Drive is an extreme off-road driving simulator that attempts to portray the specific challenge and experience of driving specially tuned SUVs through many tracks set around the world.The game is based on the Sega Rally engine and includes similar, but not as realistic, terrain deformation.System RequirementsSystem RequirementsOperating System: Windows XP/VistaProcessor: Intel Pentium IV 2 GHzMemory: 1 GBVideo card: DirectX 9.0 compatible video card with 256 MB RAMSound card: DirectX 9.0 compatibleHard disc: 8 GB
